title: Step Eleven
subtitle: We sought through prayer and meditation to improve our conscious contact with God as we understood Him, praying only for knowledge of His will for us and the power to carry that out.

questions.prompt: What is my understanding of prayer?
What is my understanding of meditation?
How do prayer and meditation improve my conscious contact with a Higher Power?
Do I have a daily practice of prayer and meditation?
What does my current prayer practice look like?
What does my current meditation practice look like?
What is working about my current practice?
What would I like to change or improve?
What does 'conscious contact' mean to me?
How do I experience conscious contact with a Higher Power?
When do I feel closest to my Higher Power?
How has my conscious contact improved since I began recovery?
What obstacles exist between me and God?
What am I doing to remove those obstacles?

questions.section: With God as we understood Him
questions.prompt: How has my understanding of a Higher Power changed since I began recovery?

questions.section: With God as we understood Him
questions.prompt: How has my understanding of a Higher Power changed since I began working the steps?

questions.section: With God as we understood Him
questions.prompt: In what ways do I experience my Higher Power?
What do I ask for when I pray?
Do I ask for material things, or do I ask for spiritual help?
Do I pray for knowledge of God's will?
How do I seek to know God's will for me?
What is the difference between my will and God's will?
How do I know when I'm following God's will?
How do I know when I'm following my own will?

questions.section: And the power to carry that out
questions.prompt: Do I trust that my Higher Power will give me the power to carry out God's will?

questions.section: And the power to carry that out
questions.prompt: Have there been times when I've asked for God's will and been given the power to carry it out? When?

questions.section: And the power to carry that out
questions.prompt: What is my part in carrying out God's will?
How am I practicing the principle of seeking in my life today?
How has my spiritual awareness grown?
How has my spiritual life improved?
How am I practicing unconditional love in my life today?
What gifts have I received from working this step?
How has my life changed as a result of my prayer and meditation practice?
How has my relationship with my Higher Power grown?
